name: Escape The Darkness- ALPHA
description:
NOTE: Before you go nuts on me saying the game sucks... Please ensure

that this game is only on Alpha, not beta or the final release.. Stay tuned for

the final release of this game. Thank you.

Controls:

W- Move forward

A- Move left

S- Move Back

D- Move right

What to do:

Find the 'Finish' platform to finish the game.

(Please play with 'DATA' on the same folder)

*BETA- will add a main menu and a finish menu when you finish one level.
